#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install mktouch
```

#### Functions
function|`__doc__`
-|-
`mktouch.mktouch(path)` |mkdir + touch

#### Examples
```python
>>> import mktouch
>>> mktouch.mktouch("folder/file")
>>> mktouch.mktouch(["folder/file1","folder/file2"])
```
